events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer role. Our team will review your resume and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering position specifically for backend developer responsibilities.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will be your point of contact moving forward for the software engineering opportunity.
The initial screening call was completed successfully where we discussed your experience with development technologies and projects.
Thank you for your prompt reply regarding the initial screening feedback and your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled with our senior engineers for next week to evaluate your development skills further.
The technical interview was completed and the interviewers were impressed by your knowledge of software architecture and coding abilities.
We have arranged for an HR interview to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits package available for engineering candidates.
The HR interview went well, covering your career expectations and confirming your interest in the engineering role we offer.
We are pleased to propose a job offer for the software engineer position, including compensation and detailed terms to review.
You have provided positive feedback on the job offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as a new software engineer in our company.
Your onboarding process has started, including access to developer tools, documentation, and team introductions.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you are fully onboarded as a valued software engineer on our development team.
